website_summaries.verdict: The oCosmo CE4001 is a decent 40-inch HDTV with an attractive $400 price, but as you might expect, features are scarce. Better budget-price options abound.
pros: Decent overall performance for the price
cons: Slightly expensive for such a bare-bones HDTV

customer_reviews.title: WORST COMPANY THAT I HAVE EVER DEALT WITH
customer_reviews.text: I GIVE IT LESS THEN A 1 STAR DO NOT BUY THIS TYPE OF TV, THEY DO NOT STAND BEHIND THEIR 1 YEAR WARRANTY THEY JUST KEEP PUTTING YOU OFF WITH HOPES THAT YOU WILL EITHER GIVE UP OR JUST GO BUY A NEW TV. BELIEVE ME THEY HAVE DONE NOTHING BUT LIE TO ME AND HE JUST TOLD ME ON THE PHONE THAT IF HE HAD KNOWN IT WAS ME ON THE PHONE THAT HE WOULDN'T EVEN HAVE PICKED UP THE PHONE.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: We were in the market for a new TV and after doing a little shopping we came across the oCosmo 40-inch on Amazon. Though we were skeptical because it was a no-name TV and inexpensive, we purchased, anyhow. Without going into great detail, (it was expressed in other reviews) this is a fine TV that fits our needs. We are not gamers, and could care less about high fidelity audio. The audio of this unit is perfect for us. Thank you oCosmo and Amazon. I notice that the price has gone up since we bought (when the TV is available). Not surprised
customer_reviews.author: ami90274

customer_reviews.title: A solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Obligatory "skeptical, but bought it anyway". Skepticism still reigns strong. Had to return the first one because the top of the frame/case was separated from the LED screen, causing a strip of backlight to shine through at the top of the screen. I'm waiting for the replacement to arrive, and I'll update my review accordingly. Edit: Second TV is free of screen/case problems. Sound is a slight issue with the new one (it wasn't a problem with the first defective one), as there's a static/tinniness at high volumes. Will definitely be getting some speakers to mitigate the problem. Other than that, good picture, good TV, probably the best available for $280+tax.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 Years Later....Still Perfect With No Lines Or Spots!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this TV for a year and a half now and have absolutely NO complaints. It has been well worth the price. I was skeptical as I have never heard of the brand before, and was super cheap. The picture is super bright and sharp with no lines or dead pixels. I would estimate we use this for 5-10 hours a day (I know, I know). I love how the HDMI hookups (there are 3) are on the side making it way to switch between gaming systems and Blu-ray players. I use a sound bar with this TV so I can not comment on the sound as I have never used it,
customer_reviews.author: Casey JonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: picture is clear and bright with a Blue-ray playing, with no noticeable blur. I do not have a game console hooked up to this TV, so keep searching for reviews if that's its intended purpose. The cons are typical for this price point: it does not handle black as well as my nicer monitors, and you will notice when there is no active input the black screen is blotchy. Also, oCosmo is clearly trying to create some brand recognition so you will be treated to their logo for a second or two upon power-up to compensate for the extremely competitive price. Neither of these are reason enough to avoid this otherwise perfectly functional TV.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lee

customer_reviews.title: Decent product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Came in good working order. The documentation was minimal but clear enough. Pros: Good picture. Acceptable built in sound. Enough inputs. The Roku buttons on the remove can be setup to run an AppleTV. Light, and mounted on wall bracket easily. Cons: Build quality just okay. A bit "plasticky" overall. The power cord is not long and is not detachable which meant I had to get a bit more creative then prior TV to run it in the wall. All of the inputs are rather closely packed so had to replace a cable with larger plug. Overall very happy with the unit for the price. Hopefully it will hold up with time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tv with skepticism, but it was cheaper than i could find used. I went ahead and ordered because of the one year warranty. I have found this to be an excellent buy! The color and picture quality is fantastic, it's very light weight and the picture doesn't fade when viewed on any angle. I saw a-lot of "warning" ratings for this product... but as far as i'm concerned they are not legit unless they actually bought and tried the product. Looking forward to seeing more from ocozmo... Vizio started in much the same way after all... better get one while they're cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome picture for a very affordable price
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a 46-inch television screen but were dismayed at the prices. We came across this on Amazon and looked at the reviews. Also, we looked at the ports for accessory devices and decided to give it a try. We are very pleased with the quality of the picture and ability to plug in all the essential devices needed for our sound system. The built-in sound speaker is not great but adequate, although we prefer to run this through our sound system which worked out beautifully for us. All in all, great product for the price. Now we will see how long it lasts without trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Sarose

customer_reviews.title: a 40", 1080p SLIM tv for under $300!!! (got mine for alot less on Black Friday)
customer_reviews.text: Of course this isn't going to look as sweat as a Samsung model, cheapest model i can find for Samsung will run you $350+. However with that being said, its great! Bought this for my sister who wanted a bigger tv, and she is extremely happy vs her old tube HDTV. Plays some content from USB (Jpegs & MP4's), and its Energy Efficient! (if you care about that kind of stuff). If your one a budget, or you need to put a tv in a room that gets little traffic, consider this model. Not to mention that because this is a ridiculously cheap tv, you can purchase an extended warranty for pennies incase it craps out on you .
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Features for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a TV for a while I could not decide. When I saw the price for this TV drop to $250 and I bought it. I use it for watching Netflix, NFL games, and occasional video games, at which excels. Pros: * Great Color * Fantastic Price ($250 July 2014) * Super Light * Tons of Inputs Cons: * Speakers are a bit weak, consider getting a sound bar * Sometimes has refresh issues with semi static images (slowly scrolling scenery) Considering the price to quality/features ratio this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV back in November when it was on sale and at the time it was under $300. In all honesty, despite the deal I got for it. It's performance is phenomenal! Some of you might beg to differ like my friend. Who seems to says there's an input delay with these type of TV/monitors, but I don't care! If there is, it's so subtle that I can't notice it. It could also be because I've never own an HD TV or anything bigger than 32 inch. All that matters is that I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nesme0035

customer_reviews.title: This is a really solid TV for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid TV for the price. Sound is good. I bought it as a gaming TV for my boys to use in the basement, and neither the 14 year old nor the younger have any complaints. It's not a Sony Bravia, that's not why I bought it. But for a solid extra room/basement/kid TV, it's working great for us. And seriously you can't beat the price. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lotta_chaos

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS TV.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tv I ever owned. I bought it in cyber sale for 249.00 after reading several positive reviews on it The pictures are vivid and large. This is my first 40 inch screen tv. I was sceptical at first, mainly because of the price and because I do not reside in the us. It was shipped to my freight forwarder in Florida who sent it to me. I had some help setting it up. We followed the direction in one review to get the best picture. I am really happy with the purchase. I did not purchase any warranty,so I am counting on good luck.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty impressed with this TV. For $278, I wasn't expecting too much but the picture quality is pretty nice. In HD the picture is really good, in SD it's ok. The sound is fine. There's nothing fancy about it, it's a basic TV but it does it well. I also got the 32", but the picture quality isn't as good as the 40". This is a great TV for the price. For the conspiracy theorists out there, I'm a verified purchaser and in no way associated with the company. For the skeptics, amazon has a liberal return policy and these LED TVs weigh next to nothing compared to older TVs.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: New brand of Sceptre, perfect picture
customer_reviews.text: This is the same Sceptre company that had the most highly rated 38" TV on Amazon about a year ago. I purchased that one too, and I can say that this oCosmo is essentially the same. The picture is perfect, even the menus are the same as the Sceptre that I loved so much. Everyone seems to be adding their own preferred sound system, since the stock sound is just OK. The Roku Ready feature is made for the Roku Streaming Stick ($90), and makes it a Smart TV rather affordably, with no cables or visible boxes. I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: thecaliforniakid

customer_reviews.title: I got it on a super sale. For the price I paid it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it on a super sale. For the price I paid it was an incredible deal. A couple dead pixels but not really noticeable. Color good, black decent. No 'smart' features of course. I use it as my computer monitor and windows looks plenty crisp / running at max resolution. Way better TVs out there but none for such a steal if you get it on a good sale like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mindsurfer

customer_reviews.title: Very very good for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Very very good for the cost. Screen looks excellent, colors are beautiful. Ghosting is quite bad but I only notice this when editing word documents and maybe 'very' slightly when web browsing. I play Diablo 3 with it from a few feet away w/ my wife and it's pretty awesome. The stand construction, and remote construction is decent but not great. The power cable has a nick out of it (didn't come that way) but I'm not really sure how that happened so, no knocks against oCOSMO. Don't expect Samsung or Sony quality, but at the cost, I can't imagine being disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Black Friday deal works out great!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is currently in my 9 year old son's game room and is connected to his Wii-U. He watches Netflix and Youtube and also plays games on it. It looks great and is extremely light. If you can get it for a good price like we did I would definitely recommend. The only downside is the Wii-U doesn't recognize this Brand (oCosmo) and won't let you control the TV from the Wii-U remote. Other than that we have had no issues and the picture is great.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni D. Martello

customer_reviews.title: Great image, soso sound
customer_reviews.text: A great deal. Just make sure you have another speaker system because the sound isn't great at all. Adequate at best, but totally fixable with a sound box or separate surround sound speaker system. Not a super smart computer, but you can't beat the price and the picture is great. Nice thin frame as well so it doesn't take up much room for a nice sized tv. (I don't mind the black frame, but would have been nicer if it was a dull finish.) (Has 3 usb ports.)
customer_reviews.author: GigiGramercyGirl

customer_reviews.title: I like this tv
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed by the quality for the price. I did a lot of research before buying this TV and the positive reviews accurately reflect this tv. It was really easy to assemble and I haven't had any problems with display or audio. It works well with my old roku (not a roku stick) although I had to buy an hdmi cable instead of using the av cables. I'm not huge into technology so I don't know if it's actually a great tv but it's great for what I use it for (netflix, movies...), it looks nice, works well and was easy to put together/use, so I think that makes it great.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend on the whim. I don't know much about TV's, but the price was right so I took the risk. The picture is clear is sound is clear. Setup was quick and easy. He is incredibly happy and I am impressed with it when I watch it, too! I definitely recommend this. Not to mention, I ordered on a Friday evening, and it arrived on my doorstep Monday late morning. I will say this though - it was shipped in the actual TV box, so anyone who sees the package knows that is inside. Make sure you're home to receive it if you live in an urban area.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: great tv
customer_reviews.text: this tv is outside to the cold elements-high quality pic and has withstood the test of outside time
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Levings

customer_reviews.title: Will not last.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this TV for a little over 1 year and it no longer works. Within 4 months, the screen had dead pixels. Before it died, the tv actually had great picture quality and sound. Its a shame it did not last longer. You get what you pay for. Pro: Good picture and sound Con: Poor Durability
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Stopped powering on properly
customer_reviews.text: It stopped powering on properly after 1 year 4 months. It hasn't moved the entire time so no physical damage to blame. Now when I want to use it, I have to play this game where I press power, doesn't turn on, unplug it, press power again, repeat until it comes on. This could go on forever or until I give up and decide to do something better with my life. But the picture is great.
customer_reviews.author: bohojobo

customer_reviews.title: TV Initial Presentation is Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Once I turn it on even with my cable carrier and HD box the picture is just about normal but not half as good as my 40 inch LG in my other room. I works, it has a nice loud sound so I can hear it over my treadmill and it was very easy to fit on a mounting bracket. It is very light, and for the price? I got what I paid for. I did buy the added TV protection plan and haven't had to use it. It does sound kind of "limp" but my TV was at the price I could afford.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Garcia

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is nice!
customer_reviews.text: The tv is a pretty good but only because how the price to quality ratio. It's volume is probably the worst part of it 1-5 sound the same and the volume stops making any difference after about 17. I'd say it's and okay bed room tv not the best for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: *May update soon; sound not working
customer_reviews.text: *May update soon This TVs good reviews far out-weigh the bad ones. Seems like the factory is pretty inconsistent with the quality of TV that they put out. I unboxed it, and set it up. As far as I can tell, the picture is decent. But I'm going to have to ship this back to Amazon tomorrow, because the sound isn't working at all. The set emits a clicking sound with the TV turned on, and no amount of settings adjustments or other changes to the set seem to work. Obviously, I'm not going to be ok with that. Once I return it and receive the new TV I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Wells

customer_reviews.title: happily suprised.
customer_reviews.text: Buying a $250 tv 40 inch I was hugely skeptical. Plus the name cosmo I've never heard of. So I did my research and read the reviews. Nothing but good things were said. So I took a chance on it. Let me say I am blown away with the picture quality. And the sound quality is loud and clear. Compared to my Samsung 40 inch and paid close to $500 for it there is no difference. This company sells for so cheap because they are not well known. It doesn't reflect on quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Our 40" Ocosmo TV(s)
customer_reviews.text: We started out ordering a 40" Ocosmo brand TV that We had never heard of, because of the good price. After receiving it, seeing the picture, hearing the sound, and setting up the Roku stick we had ordered with it - We ended up ordering (2) more of the same 40" TVs and our son ordered one too.
customer_reviews.author: Marco and Tilly, NV

customer_reviews.title: Don't see how you can beat this for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this set for a couple weeks now, but am very impressed so far. The picture and sound seem great to me, although I will say this is the first flatscreen TV I've owned over 18 inches or so. I mean, for the price ... it's just a perfectly good TV in my opinion. Very lightweight, easy to set up. My one negative point is that I didn't realize that "Roku-ready" meant you have to purchase a Roku USB stick to use Roku.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this for the price but still can't get picture ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this for the price but still can't get picture to look anything like the 1080p it's suppose to put out, even with lots of tweaking. Got MUCH better picture from tube tv. It programs with Sony code btw. Not worth the buy, very disappointed. Going with a more recognized brand next time. *Taken down to one star. Picture quit after 9 months with sounds not far behind.
customer_reviews.author: Samsy

customer_reviews.title: First the remote, isn't a pleasure to use, ...
customer_reviews.text: First the remote, isn't a pleasure to use, The TV only worked for a little while, then the on/off function quit working, the blue onlight, shows but the tv won't turn on, and the on/off switches don't work, turn off muiti-switch, then do that several time and it would start, but this morning, it turned on with no reception on any channel, looking for my two year warrenty
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a larger tv and really didn't want or need to spend a lot of money on it. Saw this tv and the price really caught my eye. Read the reviews and thought I would take a chance. I ordered it on Saturday for $249 and received it on Monday. Hooked it up last night and while there may be "better" units available, I don't think you will be disappointed with it. Time will tell as far as the reliability but for now I'm very pleased with my choice. I gave it 5 stars not because it's this best tv but because of what your getting for the money.
customer_reviews.author: William Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Best Bet
customer_reviews.text: Why pay a high price for a flat screen that is no better than this? No reason! Excellent quality picture and sound from standard speakers. We bought this one to be a 'portable' unit that we can use wherever we want it. Out on the patio, on the roof deck, in the rec room. Wherever there is a good WiFi signal, the Roku stick we have plugged in the back enables us to watch whatever we want.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: GREAT price, haven't had a single problem. I was a little worried since it was quite a bit cheaper than most other 40'' tvs I had seen, and I hadn't heard of the brand. But I love it. It's a little hard to plug and unplug devices since it is very thin/close to the wall, but that's no issue at all. Would absolutely buy again. One note: Sound quality is only slightly better than what you'd expect, so go for a sound bar as well if you feel like that would be important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Townley

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: For the low cost of this TV I was skeptical in purchasing a brand I had never heard of but after reading the reviews and knowing I had a limited budget I decided to go for it. The review were dead on (the good ones that is). I am amazed at the picture quality. The sound was also amazing so the complaints indicated in the comments make no sense to me. It is light weight and swivels on the base. It does the screen does measure 40 inches. This is a great TV and I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: sptacy

customer_reviews.title: freggin awesome.
customer_reviews.text: honestly one of the best I have ever owned. Bought this Cyber Monday 2014 when I was still stationed in Germany and had to shipped to my next base to wait for me. Been in my living room ever since and brings me great cinema pleasure. crisp smooth picture and awesome color. Works great with xbox one as well, and just incase any of yall where wondering how to hook up xbox one Kinect to turn your tv when you turn xbox on, use the Sony code. it works. only wish they had bigger sets so I could move this on into my bedroom and put a new one in the living room. great buy, get one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew KillKelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had for over year now so can pretty solidly stand behind the quality. I would put the picture up against a Vizio or other brand at twice the price with no hesitation. The sound is ok but probably the big flaw of this one. It lacks any warmth or true depth. On the other hand I was able to pick up a sound bar for it with the money I saved and still came out way ahead.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with our new oCosmo 40" TV we got for the bedroom. I'll agree with others that the sound is not the greatest, but we have a Sound Bar with a Subwoofer and all is wonderful. When I purchased the TV I also took a chance on purchasing a Roku Stick, since the TV is Roku Ready. We are extremely pleased with that too! The two together were a few of the very best purchases I made for our home in 2013, no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: R. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV for the $, low volume, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking television, great picture. Only drawback is the volume/sound in the tv is quiet - doesn't get very loud and the gradient isn't very high. Will eventually look into a sound system which is much needed with this tv but overall excellent quality for the price. Poor packaging when it arrived. Left on my front door in it's standard box advertising a 40" flat screen tv. Should have made it more discrete. They might have well as left it on my street thankfully I got home shortly after it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Cody M

customer_reviews.title: An Easy choice
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those geeky guys in the family that everyone asks to fix there computers or choosing a tablet or asking if this is a good price for a tv. And I cant lie I do research everything online and on store to get the best price and quality for any electronics. And I highly recommend this tv for up to 300$ but I bought mine at 250 here at amazon :)
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Sanchez (PC Gamer) (Nerd)

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV for the price. Seriously I don't know how you can do better. Looks great, great picture, easy to set up. If I had to criticize it for anything it would be the sound. Adequate but a little tinny. So a sound bar or surround system would be a great addition, but that's pretty much true for every TV at this price and many more expensive ones. Just buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AceCadet

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any problems with this TV. It's constantly on when we're home. Like other TV's the speakers aren't the best, but the picture is fine. Update: After 6 months the remote control stopped working. I followed the instructions on how to fix it and it still didn't work. It's a pretty cheap remote. I haven't made it to the store to get a universal remote yet.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Don't Be Afraid of Off Brand
customer_reviews.text: oCOSMO? Never heard of it but I took the risk anyways and this TV has performed like any other TV. I thrive in technology and read about all the latest advancements in technology, built my own computer, know hardware and software etc. I can guarantee you that this brand is nothing short of what you would get from LG, Sony, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Ford

customer_reviews.title: It is as they say! (Perfect for me) Big Screen and Nice price (NOTHING WRONG) BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Its just what i wanted ... a perfect big screen, it is not the best product out there but i have nothing bad to say about it (GOOD PRICE) ... If i see anything else oCOSMO i'll be sure that i can buy it, i won't be afraid of that brand, NICE TV, NICE RESOLUTION, Everything is perfect with it (I'm using it as an extended screen) and it works FLAWLESS , I'll recommend this to anyone that is looking for a cheap and NICE Screen/monitor/Tv
customer_reviews.author: GrandMasterX3

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Crud packing.
customer_reviews.text: The TV was a great price and has really exceptional quality to the picture. Buuuut none of the parts matched up (the base that connects to the TV - which is fine, we wall mounted ours... and the screws were too big!) So, it was an absolute pain to put together and figure out, plus we had to take a trip to the hardware store...but oh well. For that price you can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: spanishcastle

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Budget TV That Doesn't Skip on Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: This TV is amazing for the price. I have only had it for a short while so I don't know how well it will withstand the test of time but it seems to be sturdy and of quality. The picture quality is just as good as my LG TV of the same size which was quite a bit more expensive. There isn't any fancy smart TV features, but I would prefer just to add an external device to get smart TV like features anyhow. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Kale

customer_reviews.title: Like finding money in your coat pocket from last year, Lucky!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is so amazing for the price you will feel guilty about how little the workers making it must be earning. If you can deal with that (and guess I will have to learn to) then ... WOW, it will be the best purchase you'll make this year. By the way, the sound is fine and everything was in the box. It was delivered so quickly I think it must have come by ambulance. I rarely have good luck like this so I'm sort of expecting it to soon burn my house down and I'll let you know soon, but I sure hope not! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wagner

customer_reviews.title: A really great television for the price
customer_reviews.text: A really great television for the price. I truly appreciated the fact that they included a small Phillips head screwdriver to screw in the base. I have 12,000 screwdrivers strewn about my home, but no one in my house knows how to put them back where they found them, so good luck with finding one when you need one. Thank goodnesd this TV came with one. Also, the picture is crystal clear and the setup was incredibly easy.
customer_reviews.author: MJCA

customer_reviews.title: HDMI GAMEING SCREEN.
customer_reviews.text: Xbox HDMI picture is good, ps2 AVI picture OK, satellite cable TV OK, remote lacks functions to scroll all input video, sound quality thru TV lacks a lot but with a sound bar outlet then all is good, I have a karaoke plugged there, it is a OK TV but gameing thru HDMI is best, so if you want a TV for cable or satellite look at a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry and Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent slim tv!
customer_reviews.text: Tv is incredibly slim. Watching tv now is better than before because of its sharp picture and slim sleek look. It was very cost effective for this brand and size. It does it job by providing excellent picture and sound for viewers. Go for this tv if you dont care about brand and want to have a good experience watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: I still love it! Great picture
customer_reviews.text: I have had this T.V. for 2 years. I bought it as a deal post Thanksgiving because it was cheap. I still love it! Great picture. Easy to use. It's a good, solid product. I would buy this brand again. Shipped well. Easy to assemble the swivel stand.
customer_reviews.author: Momsdialogue

customer_reviews.title: Great picture for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV to replace a 32" name brand LCD in the Master Bedroom. Very impressed with this set! It's thin, light and looks very good on the wall mount. The picture is clear, vibrant and has very good contrast / black levels right out of the box. The picture will only improve after calibration with Digital Video Essentials HD. Don't be afraid of the off-brand name on this set. For a budget HD TV, you can't beat it. Very happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: W Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This TV came with a few classy extras that others I've purchased did not. It had a proper stand and even included a screwdriver in the bag so you can throw it all together right from the box. The instructions actually made sense; the whole experience is very user friendly. I have this set up to run high definition movies through a Roku and I couldn't be more pleased with the picture quality. If you have a space that needs a "not-enormous" screen that looks top-notch, then this is an excellent deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: Good picture, inputs, and price was a bargin. Con is the sound. I have adjusted many times and you cannot make it sound good without a stereo or soundbar. At the price I paid you can afford a sound bar. I like my TCL 32 inch I purchased a year ago a little better as the sound is much better and just as good of picture. As a side note the first one I got had a broken screen and Amazon immediately sent out a replacement. You just cannot beat Amazon for customer service. With better sound this would be a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: great upgrade, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: for this awesome price point I received a carefully package 40"hdtv. It was super easy to assemble and set up. The picture is a huge upgrade from our 1990s 29inch family room TV. If you are looking for an inexpensive Hdtv, this will do nicely. sound options were fine for my 11x20 room.
customer_reviews.author: B. Peysar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy, especially for the price. Images look very good. I do not have any kind of tv service, we use google chrome to watch Netflix, Youtube, etc. And also connect our computer directly via the HDMI port and the images look amazing! Very happy with this purchase. I would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Duque

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of them for kids to game on side by side
customer_reviews.text: For the price of one...this risk was well worth it. The TVs work fine for what they are intended for, including watching movies on Netflix, The sound is fine, which appears to have been the only, and rather meager issue voiced by reviews I read. The connectivity of these sets is outstanding...lots of ports for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Berger

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: 40 inch led system for $270, not too bad at all! Has sufficient collection inputs/outputs and satisfactory, if not stellar display (only 60hz, and not the sharpest/brightest picture). Considering the price it is a great performer and great value. No real problems out of the box. Had to perform just a little setup tweaking for the audio because I am using computer speakers connected via headphone jack; a full set of mini phono jacks for a 5.1 computer speaker system is not provided. Interesting, though, the remote supports control of a sound bar, and that is the better way to go if you can afford one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hahn

customer_reviews.title: good tv for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Its GREAT!!! It arrived safely no missing parts. It was easy to set the stand on it. The picture looks good and sharp. I use my amazon fire with it and some creative speakers. It was a good movie night. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleasantly surprised by this tv. It was on sale for $249 and I was thinking, well let's see what $249 can get ya these days. Plus I had $110 in gc's, so I got this nice tv for about $156 all done and told (thanks Prime for the free shipping!). It's perfect for my son's room for his gaming system.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Cernius

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of people, I was a little skeptical of a brand I had never heard of, but decided to give it a shot since it was such a good price. So far I'm pretty pleased. It's not the best picture, as some people have said. I definitely wouldn't have put it up again the $800 TV or whatever people were saying. My 5 year old LCD seems to have a slightly better picture. But for $250, it's more than I expected, so overall I'm happy with the purchase at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: ok i had to fix it when it got here ...
customer_reviews.text: ok i had to fix it when it got here, was really worried about it. The screen was out of the holder. pushed it back and its still working
customer_reviews.author: WKC

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance and ordered along with their soundbar. Love the tv, colors and contrast. Sound was okay but the sound bar made a big difference. Friends and family alike all say you couldn't ask for a better picture and found it hard to believe how inexpensive it was. I was always a Sony Trinitron user but I am very happy with this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this TV for 24 hours, but wow, what a nice TV for such a great price! It was very easy to set up out of the box and took me only about 30 minutes to set up. The directions are very easy to follow and they even include a small screw driver to put the TV on its platform. I can't wait to see some movies on it, but even basic cable non HD channels look great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: No one can believe we paid just $250 for this baby. The resolution is great. We have it hooked up to our computer, so it doubles as a monitor. The computer wallpaper is of pictures we have taken of Idaho back country. Sometimes, as we walk through our living room, we have to just stop and stare at the beauty that is on the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: CHAD H COLE

customer_reviews.title: I ordered it almost 2years ago and it still works beautifully. The picture and sound are great also
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this TV is a steal. I ordered it almost 2years ago and it still works beautifully. The picture and sound are great also. I tend to listen to the negative reviews more but I'm so glad I took a leap of faith with oCosmo! Easily best purchase of christmad 2013 that still keeps on giving!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Picked this bad boy up on cyber Monday this year (2013). Like many others, I was very skeptical of a tv this size being sold for such a low price. I looked around at forums and couldn't find anything conclusive that said this was a bad idea, so I pulled the trigger and bought one. I'm very happy with the turn out! Picture quality, while not stunning, is remarkably good. Someone else said their sound was too low, but I actually have the opposite problem. While watching at night, I need to turn my volume down to 1, and even then it's still a little loud. My Xbox One is very happy with this tv, and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Bingmanson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great deal at $249 and works as well as more expensive models. Sound is good enough for me and the picture, after a little playing around with the settings, is nice and crisp. TV is really light and I like the swiveling base. I would highly recommend the brand and will definitely keep oCosmo in mind for future TV purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Kikicat

customer_reviews.title: Works great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality - as noted on other reviews - is not the best. Cured with a add on surround system / or a sound bar. Picture was great out of the box, and quite pleased with the purchase - especially when you consider the price. Wall mounted my unit, an the TV has 4 mounting "nuts" embedded in the back. Again, worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my tv
customer_reviews.text: The tv arrived in two days, as promised. All of the pieces were included, even batteries for the remote and a screwdriver to assemble the stand. It was very easy to put together; I was able to do it by myself. The picture quality is great for the price. Others complained of poor sounf quality, but I think it is fine. I would definitely recommend this product, especially at this unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie M.

customer_reviews.title: $250 AND 3 HDMI ports?  Sold.
customer_reviews.text: Really should be 4-1/2 stars - my only fault with it is the (apparent) lack of discrete remote codes to change the inputs. It is not in Harmony's database, so I had to teach mine most of the remote functions. I'm not going to comment on the picture, because I honestly probably wouldn't know good from terrible. I will say that it looks just fine to me, and the speakers seem OK for a bedroom environment. I would not use them for a family room set. The real thing here is the price AND the 3 HDMI inputs. I was unable to find a similarly spec'd set for even $200 more.
customer_reviews.author: dangineer

customer_reviews.title: The television is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I got this television for my daughter for Christmas. I got it on cyber Monday for $265, and it is a very good television. Currently hoping to find another one. The TV comes with a lot of connection formats for external equipment. The picture quality was excellent considering the price. I see people comment on the sound quality but it sounds good especially for a teen. I just purchase her a oCOSMO sound bar and it not only sounds goods her remote has control for it. Perfect all around television, and for the price you can't beat it. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: James E .Smith

customer_reviews.title: Over two years and still love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two and a half years ago and it's still working just like new. It's been a really great TV. Excellent value for money. Flawless picture, great color, good sound. For playing video, I'll typically connect a laptop via HDMI or else Chromecast the content. Never had a single problem once.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Names Disliked

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas. Other reviews are correct when they say that it takes a little tweaking to dial the picture in. My teenaged son figured it out and is using it for video games. He was quite impressed with the picture once he got it adjusted to his satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Totally legit!
customer_reviews.text: When Amazon put these on sale for $249 I bought one as a gift for my dad. The price made me skeptical, so I unboxed it and set it up to check it out before I give it to him. I'm happy to report it seems to be a very nice television! Fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.author: boca.llena.de.galletitas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Less than tree years i ordered this Item and screen's TV do not works,
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Medina

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a little Skeptical about this TV at first, so i did some research online and couldn't find anybody saying much bad about it. They said the picture was amazing. and for 249 black friday deal i couldn't resist. I bout it and was very surprised how good the picture looked, deep black vivid color. i wanted a 120Hz TV but that is like 600 dollars. I am not disapointed with 60 Hz. Looks just fine. Great TV, Been 4 months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Majan68

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this
customer_reviews.text: The picture is good and don't have any real problem with the TV. The only small problem is the volume does not go as low as I would like it. Volume level 1 is still pretty loud. If they could have put more resolution on the volume i'd have given this 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Cdunn8888

customer_reviews.title: Rate it for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved and needed a decent tv... fast. One that I wouldn't mind in my bedroom later. This was cheap and did the trick. Sure it only has a 60hz refresh rate, but it gets the job done quite well. This will make a nice tv for my bedroom once I get a nice plasma to replace it. If you know what you are buying, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Crispin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME picture!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new t.v. purchased this on Cyber Monday and got an awesome deal. I had never heard off this brand but decided to buy anyways since this was just a t.v. for my bedroom, I am totally impressed, sound & picture are really good. I've purchased a Google Chrome Cast for it & I LOVE it, instant smart t.v.!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: great TV useless USB port
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this TV except the USB port is nearly useless. I would like it to be able to watch movies that are saved on a USB device but it can't. All it can really do is display pictures from the USB. I do that pretty much never.
customer_reviews.author: Chello

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the price this TV is legit. Have had it for a month now. The picture is not the quality you'd get with a $500 or $600 tv, but its pretty close. So far it functions perfectly and has a nice enough picture that you'd never guess it was a cheap TV. We hooked up a ROKU stick and it works great as well. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sanft

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good tv! Would not expect the picture or even ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good tv! Would not expect the picture or even the size of tv for such a great price!The only thing is tthe sound at first is a little weak but if you adjust the bass to +8 and the tremble to +3 it is much better! All in all a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: A great disappointment to buy this tv
customer_reviews.text: A great disappointment to buy this tv, swayed me his good reputation in amazon, the remote control does not work, poor quality of it is, now I have to spend more money on finding a universal remote, sometimes you get what expensive buy this brand of tv for good price but quality disappoints. !!
customer_reviews.author: thenickname

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful image quality
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful image quality! Also, no matter what angle you view the TV from, the image looks the exact same. This TV was easy to setup, and is also very light with the entire package being only 28 pound. At $280, this TV is quite the bargain. I have absolutely no complaints and am completely satisfied with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Ahsan Mizan

customer_reviews.title: great tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: When I see the price for this tv, i thought it will not be that good and rewievs are fake here. but i just tried my luck and bought this tv and now I reallylove it. great display, screen resolution, compatible with ps3, roku stick, chromecast. I haven't faced any bad issue for last 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Omer Ocak

customer_reviews.title: Great budget TV
customer_reviews.text: Great budget TV, recently started having an issue with the backlight making lines in solid black areas. Doesn't happen all the time but fairly distracting when it does. But for the price, I think it has performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Planned obsolescence at its finest. I guess it was too cheap to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Randomly failed after two years of light use. Planned obsolescence at its finest. I guess it was too cheap to be true. It was great while it worked, but I have LCD HDTVs from 6+ years ago that still work great. Obviously, it's a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: oCosmo?  Made me laugh but I liked the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a budget decision. For $249. it is the best size tv for the price! Yes...I have never heard of oCosmo and it kind of made me laugh to think about it but it has a pretty decent picture. I am looking into a Roku Streaming Stick or a Google Chrome Cast for it but to be continued... The colors are excellent with digital signals like dvds and streaming from BDs but since I have basic cable most things are in 480 instead of 1080. But for the 1080 channels that I do get...pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: WorldWhiskeyWhisperer

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a 2nd monitor for my computer at work. It was one of the few i could find with a VGA input. I have since upgraded the computer and now use HDMI connection. Very good quality for the price. Almost 2 years since i bought it and it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: O cosmo, Ocosmo, strange name but works great.
customer_reviews.text: This Led Hdtv is actually very nice. I ordered it and it arrived pretty quickly. The picture shows really good and clear as can be when watching hd channels. The sound quality is standard, although I'm not expecting a bose theater sound. The motion of the 60Hz refresh rate has not been a factor, it stays up to par so far. Im just a week in to having the tv, so I'm satisfied with the purchase as of today.
customer_reviews.author: wally adesanya

customer_reviews.title: Great picture bargain pricing
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't for the Amazon reviews, I don't think we would have bought this. Nowhere else on the internet can you find to many details on this tv. But the reviews are spot on, it's a great tv. It's no samsung, but for the price, picture quality is awesome. It does have some decent customizations and works great in the bedroom. If you can find this tv at the $250 mark, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S Mock

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding TV!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this was a terrific purchase; by far the best value in a 40" LCD TV! Brilliant colors, rich blacks, better sound than many others I've seen. Mounted to a wall, so can't speak to the base, but it seems fine. If it lasts, then this is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: Really a good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this TV. I ordered it after reading a lot of the reviews because I couldn't believe how cheap the price was. I figured, if it's no good, I can always send it back. Just to be on the safe side, I got the 3 year extended warranty for $20 extra. I've had it now since last November and haven't had any problems. I'm really happy with the picture quality and overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I turned our garage into a giant playroom for our son. He loves it and we enjoy waching him play, but now that we are spending a lot of time in the garage, we need something more to entertain adults. With this tv we also bought a Chromecast and it is now so easy to connect the TV to our wireless. We watch netflix, HBOGo, Hulu, amazon movies, etc! The garage is now a much happier place for the whole family! Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who is not into Smart TV or using it as a monitor or video display. She runs cable TV through it and tells me constantly how great the picture is. It's got good sound and is a great TV for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... BACK PORCH FOR ALMOST A YEAR & HAS PERFORMED GREAT. WAS WORRIED ABOUT THE COLD
customer_reviews.text: TV HAS BEEN ON OUR BACK PORCH FOR ALMOST A YEAR & HAS PERFORMED GREAT. WAS WORRIED ABOUT THE COLD, HEAT & HUMIDITY HERE IN SC, BUT OUR PORCH HAS THE NEW VINYL WINDOWS WHICH KEEPS THE RAIN & DUST OUT. THIS TV HAS GREAT SOUND & COLOR. A GOOD CHOICE!. PAUL JONES
customer_reviews.author: C.P.JONES

customer_reviews.title: Good value tv all around
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for the kids rooms and they are good quality tv's for price n perfect size. Did have a lil fine ref line going across screen inch from bottom on one. No big deal had them foe almost 2 yrs. Definitely pleased tho
customer_reviews.author: Big Money

customer_reviews.title: Although it's a brand name I never heard of, ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a brand name I never heard of, the price price was what captured my attention. But, since I purchased it I have seen any complaints. If I needed another TV, I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Essie B. Horton

product_meta.title: oCOSMO CE4001/CE4001-A 40-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV
product_meta.description:
Future proof your home entertainment now with the oCOSMO CE4001, a super slim designed 40 LED TV! Enter a world of HD picture quality that's crisp, clear, and with incredible detail. Dazzling viewers with rich vibrant colors, this TV supports the latest connectivity including one HDMI port with ROKUTM and MHLTM support! With the combination of friendly service and brilliant picture quality, this oCOSMO LED TV is the perfect addition to your home.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Inputs: 3 HDMI, 1 MHL Port, 1 USB Port

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars720 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
